text:
Hi All,

Is there any way to get the Environment variable inside - Hubl Code ?
Is there a way to show a different(than whats defined in the blog settings) number of posts on page one of the post listing? like show 12 posts on page one then 9 for all the other pages?

Anyone know a way to dynamically add prefetch link tags to the head from a module? Is that possible? Thinking that if a header banner is usually the LCP then preloading it would help with page performance. At least that seems to be what google is recommending. Wondering if there is a way to add tags to the head without needing to do it manually on each page?
